conversation.content: Hello, thank you for calling HealthCare Plus. How may I help you today?
I want to book an appointment with Dr. Sharma for next week.
Sure, let me check availability. Could you provide your name and date of birth?
My name is Rahul Kumar.
And your date of birth?
15th March 1990.
Thank you. I see we have slots on Tuesday 2 PM and Thursday 10 AM. Which do you prefer?
Thursday 10 AM works.
I'm sorry, our system is down at the moment. Could you please call back in an hour? We'll try to book it then.
Okay, I'll call back.
Hi, this is from Wellness Solutions. You had shown interest in our annual health checkup package.
Yes, I was interested. What's the price?
The package is 4999 rupees and includes 25 tests. Would you like to proceed?
That sounds good. How do I pay?
We accept UPI and card. I can send you a payment link.
Send the link to my email please.
I don't have access to send emails from here. You need to visit our website and enter your details to get the link.
I don't have time for that right now. I'll do it later.
Sure, feel free to reach out when ready.
Good morning, Medical Helpline. How can I assist you?
I need to speak with a doctor about my recurring headache and dizziness.
I'll connect you to our consultant. Please hold.
I'm sorry, all our consultants are busy. The wait time is about 45 minutes. Would you like to wait or get a callback?
I need advice soon. Can I get a callback in 30 minutes?
We only do callbacks within 2 hours. I can put you in queue for a callback.
That's too long. I'll try another service. Thanks.
I understand. Thank you for calling.
